feed.title: Current Watches, Warnings and Advisories for New Zealand issued by MetService
feed.rights: Copyright Meteorological Service of New Zealand Limited, 2025. Licensed under Creative Commons BY 4.0.

entry.title: Strong Wind Warning - Orange
entry.summary: Severe gale northwest gusting 120 km/h in exposed places. Impact: Damage to trees, powerlines, and unsecured structures possible. Driving may be difficult, especially for high-sided vehicles and motorcycles. Chance of upgrading to a Red Warning: Minimal.

author.name: Meteorological Service of New Zealand Limited

entry.title: Heavy Rain Watch
entry.summary: A period of heavy rain, and amounts may approach warning criteria. Chance of upgrading to a Warning: Low. Changes: The chance of upgrade for this Watch has been decreased to Low.

author.name: Meteorological Service of New Zealand Limited

entry.title: Heavy Rain Watch
entry.summary: A period of heavy rain. Rainfall amounts may approach warning criteria within 15 km east of the main divide. Chance of upgrading to a Warning: Low. Changes: The chance of upgrade for this Watch has been decreased to Low.

author.name: Meteorological Service of New Zealand Limited

entry.title: Strong Wind Watch
entry.summary: Northwest winds may approach severe gale in exposed places. Chance of upgrading to a Warning: Moderate.

author.name: Meteorological Service of New Zealand Limited

entry.title: Road Snowfall Warning
entry.summary: Snow showers are likely to affect the road Tuesday morning. Expect 1 to 2 cm to settle on the road above 800 metres.

author.name: Meteorological Service of New Zealand Limited

entry.title: Road Snowfall Warning
entry.summary: Snow showers could affect the road early Tuesday morning. Up to 1 cm may settle on the road above 800 metres.

author.name: Meteorological Service of New Zealand Limited

entry.title: Road Snowfall Warning
entry.summary: Rain is expected to turn to snow showers early Tuesday morning. 1 to 2 cm may accumulate about the summit of the road with lesser amounts down to 600 metres.

author.name: Meteorological Service of New Zealand Limited

entry.title: Road Snowfall Warning
entry.summary: Rain is expected to turn to snow showers Monday night until late Tuesday morning. 5 to 10 cm is expected to accumulate near the tunnel with lesser amounts down to 600 metres.

author.name: Meteorological Service of New Zealand Limited
